title: TheCatCoin
author: TheCatCoin
content: How can i build a Crypto Business, maybe Dex , with legal tax ?I need advise, i wanna build a coin, or a dex ,or defi. but want to make it legal company. i guess i need that?how do the others make it?please help, and also are there services

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: TheCatCoin on August 30, 2022, 10:17:46 PMHow can i build a Crypto Business, maybe Dex , with legal tax ?I need advise, i wanna build a coin, or a dex ,or defi. but want to make it legal company. i guess i need that?how do the others make it?please help, and also are there services> How can i build a Crypto Business, maybe Dex, with legal tax ?> Well, for starters, you need extensive knowledge of the Crypto area and years' worth of experience. And the idea of DEX is a pipe dream for many. You need a good team of developers, advertisers, a good UI and so much more.>I need advise, i wanna build a coin, or a dex ,or defi. but want to make it legal company. i guess i need that?> Building a coin with its own chain is super easy. But there's no point in creating "yet another coin" if you know what I mean. It all comes down to a good use case. > how do the others make it?> GitHub is full of open source codes. If you need more help, feel free to DM me on discord -- https://discord.gg/4t4uYnU (My name is AL1CE there)> please help, and also are there services> Many! Whether it is coin development services, or be it graphic designs or advertising, I can get you hooked with literally anything in the crypto area since I have been advertising for 5 years now.

comments.author: TheCatCoin

Sry , but you didnt answer my question.How can i build everything with legal tax. i cant find information, and many projects pop up every day

comments.body: do i need a company to create a coin and make it publish??
